titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, President, Karen Davis papers, SG 2
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, President, Karen Davis papers, SG 2 FA1127
titlestmt.author: Amy Berish

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:48 -0400.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, President, Karen Davis papers, SG 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes copies of Karen Davis' testimonies, speeches, presentations, and publications. Drafts, related research material, and correspondence are also present throughout the collection. Davis' papers also include records of internal and external meetings, related conferences and workshops, and Commonwealth Fund program files and reviews.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into five series:

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Special format items have been separated from the body of the collection and assigned a unique separation number, as noted. Requests to access open special formats should reference the unique separation number.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Commonwealth Fund archive was donated to RAC in 1985. Accretions to the collection continue on an ongoing basis. This material was transferred to the Archive Center as multiple accessions, spanning 2002-2014. Accessions include: 2002:030, 2002:031, 2002:051, 2002:052, 2007:055, 2008:065, 2012:070, 2013:002, 2013:007, 2013:008, 2014:042

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Karen E. Davis served as president of the Commonwealth Fund from 1995-2012. She spent a large part of her career at the Johns Hopkins School of Public Health as a professor of economics, and later as chairman of the Department of Health Policy and Management. Karen Davis has since been involved in the Geisinger Health System, IOM governing Council and various IOM Committees, AcademyHealth, the Kaiser Commission on Medicaid and the Uninsured, the Agency for Healthcare Quality and Research (AHRQ) National Advisory Committee, and has served on the Panel of Health Advisors for the Congressional Budget Office.
